scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n WEB,API -c green,blue "npm run dev -w apps/web" "npm run start:dev -w apps/api"
scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/web && npm run build -w apps/api
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w apps/web && npm run lint -w apps/api
scripts.format: npm run format -w apps/web && npm run format -w apps/api
scripts.test: npm -w apps/api test && npm -w apps/web test
